mapper.sql: id, loan_order, lend_date, lend_amount, status, record_status, gmt_create, feature

update bank_lend_record
loan_order = #{loanOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lend_date = #{lendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
